numerics.internal.floats



pure nothrow @nogc @safe float fpack(const bool sign, int exp, uint mantissa);
packs a float value

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool funpack(const float f, out int exp, out uint mantissa, out bool inf, out bool nan);
unpacks a float value

pure nothrow @nogc @safe double dpack(const bool sign, int exp, ulong mantissa);
packs a double value

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool dunpack(const double d, out int exp, out ulong mantissa, out bool inf, out bool nan);
unpacks a double value

pure nothrow @nogc @safe real rpack(const bool sign, int exp, ulong mantissa);
packs a real80 value

pure nothrow @nogc @safe bool runpack(const real r, out int exp, out ulong mantissa, out bool inf, out bool nan);
unpacks a real80 value
